description:
Details are scarce, but All Things Open is planning to hold a special All Things Open AI conference in March. The two-day event will be held in Durham, North Carolina, about 30 miles from ATO’s home venue.

The post It Looks As If There’s Gonna Be an ‘All Things Open AI’ in March! appeared first on Linux Today.
title: It Looks As If There’s Gonna Be an ‘All Things Open AI’ in March!

description:
StackLok Donates Minder Project to OpenSSF, Boosting Open Source Security Efforts.

The post Stacklok Donates Minder Security Project to OpenSSF appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Stacklok Donates Minder Security Project to OpenSSF
